message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $110?
I understand that 130 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try 125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we try 122?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
